posts.author: Churchburner666
posts.content:
Hey, Fairly new to hardcore character building and seen other rouge clerics that involved taking gifts ex, gift of wisdom +2 wisdom where as i'd rather not taking any gifts.
Was wondering could someone construct me a build of cleric then rouge (for rp reasons) But if really need be I can start as rouge but must hit cleric before at lvl 2 or 3. Must be human and cant use any monk because of alignment restriction. Cheers!


\m/

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Arelith has a rule that the first time you take a class, you must take at least 3 levels of that class before taking any other class, so if you take Rogue first, the earliest you could take Cleric would be level 4. Still, it is best to take Rogue at level 1 because of skill points. At level 1, you get 4x as many skill points as any other level, and Rogue gets 6 more skill points per level than Cleric gets, so that extra 6 points would be multiplied by 4 at level 1, so your build gets 24 more skill points if you take Rogue first instead of Cleric first.

It looks like this might be one of those rare cases where a third class might weaken the build, since you have ruled out Monk. I presume that Shadowdancer has its HiPS feat nerfed. Fighter might be an option for EWS, but that would mean 4 fewer levels of Cleric, making you dispellable, or you would lose 2 levels of Cleric and lose the later Tumble skill dumps and therefore -2 AC.

How about Rogue 6 Cleric 24? If you choose a god with the Trickery domain, what options do you have for the other domain? If there are no replies, I'll edit this post in about an hour with a build.

By the way, the u goes after the g in Rogue. Rouge is red make-up.
